text: 16.18: Jo 1.42 naŋga, Ef 2.20 naŋga, Sk 21.14Kamataharɨm naŋ ambɨrɨman, Na Pita. Yi krunavundi sɨhanaŋga yaŋɨrɨm indarɨmaŋgarandu haŋɨnɨŋ tɨmba hɨmba kandɨhañɨ tamɨman. Kamatɨn kɨmuhɨmundu tɨkatɨka, krunavundi yaŋɨrɨm indarɨmaŋgarandu haŋɨnɨŋ taŋguti mamɨŋgumandɨyu.16.18 Grik kuyuyɨ, ñɨmbi Pita nɨŋandɨhin, tɨmba, vava kuyu maña ŋandi.
